pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CordedA lightweight, extensible client library for Discord botsExample usage:```pyfrom corded import CordedClient, GatewayEvent, Intentsbot = CordedClient("my_token", Intents.default())@bot.on("message_create")async def on_message_create(event: GatewayEvent) -> None: data = event.typed_data print(data["content"])bot.start()```
